mapper.select: /* cetusMobigenRegistrant.getMobigenRegistrant */ SELECT CMR.REGISTRANT_UID ,CU.USER_ID AS REGISTRANT_Id ,CASE WHEN CU.USER_ID IS NULL THEN 'FALSE' ELSE 'TRUE' END AS IS_REGISTERED FROM CETUS_MOBIGEN_REGISTRANT CMR LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CMR.REGISTRANT_UID WHERE CMR.METADATA_ID = #{metadataId}
